query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.INST_ID , b.SQL_ID , b.PLAN_HASH_VALUE , b.CHILD_NUMBER SQL_CHILD# , decode(b.COMMAND_TYPE, 0,null, 1,'CREATE TABLE', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CREATE CLUSTER', 5,'ALTER CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DROP CLUSTER', 9,'CREATE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALTER INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 35,'ALTERER DATABASE', 36,'CREATE ROLLBACK SEG', 37,'ALTER ROLLBACK SEG', 38,'DROP ROLLBACK SEG', 39,'CREATE TABLESPACE', 40,'ALTER TABLESPACE', 41,'DROP TABLESPACE', 42,'ALTER SESSION', 43,'ALTER USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXECUTE', 48,'SET TRANSACTION', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CREATE USER', 52,'CREATE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET MATERIALIZED VIEW LOG', 74,'CREATEATE MATERIALIZED VIEW', 75,'ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW', 76,'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 79,'ALTERER ROLE', 85,'TRUNCATE TABLE', 86,'TRUNCATE CLUST', 88,'ALTER VIEW', 91,'CREATE FUNCTION', 92,'ALTER FUNCTION', 93,'DROP FUNCTION', 94,'CREATE PACKAGE', 95,'ALTER PACKAGE', 96,'DROP PACKAGE', 97,'CREATE PACKAGE BODY', 98,'ALTER PACKAGE BODY', 99,'DROP PACKAGE BODY', 100, 'LOGON', 101, 'LOGOFF', 102, 'LOGOFF BY CLEANUP', 103, 'SESSION REC', 104, 'SYSTEM AUDIT', 105, 'SYSTEM NOAUDIT', 106, 'AUDIT DEFAULT', 107, 'NOAUDIT DEFAULT', 108, 'SYSTEM GRANT', 109, 'SYSTEM REVOKE', 110, 'CREATE PUBLIC SYNONYM', 111, 'DROP PUBLIC SYNONYM', 112, 'CREATE PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 113, 'DROP PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 114, 'GRANT ROLE', 115, 'REVOKE ROLE', 116, 'EXECUTE PROCEDURE', 117, 'USER COMMENT', 118, 'ENABLE TRIGGER', 119, 'DISABLE TRIGGER', 120, 'ENABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 121, 'DISABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 122, 'NETWORK ERROR', 123, 'EXECUTE TYPE', 157, 'CREATE DIRECTORY', 158, 'DROP DIRECTORY', 159, 'CREATE LIBRARY', 160, 'CREATE JAVA', 161, 'ALTER JAVA', 162, 'DROP JAVA', 163, 'CREATE OPERATOR', 164, 'CREATE INDEXTYPE', 165, 'DROP INDEXTYPE', 167, 'DROP OPERATOR', 168, 'ASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 169, 'DISASSOCIATE STATISTICS', 170, 'CALL METHOD', 171, 'CREATE SUMMARY', 172, 'ALTER SUMMARY', 173, 'DROP SUMMARY', 174, 'CREATE DIMENSION', 175, 'ALTER DIMENSION', 176, 'DROP DIMENSION', 177, 'CREATE CONTEXT', 178, 'DROP CONTEXT', 179, 'ALTER OUTLINE', 180, 'CREATE OUTLINE', 181, 'DROP OUTLINE', 182, 'UPDATE INDEXES', 183, 'ALTER OPERATOR' ) Command , case when instr(b.MODULE,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(b.MODULE, 1, instr(b.MODULE,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(b.module,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(b.module, 1, instr(b.module,'.',-1,1)-1) else b.MODULE end MODULE , nvl(b.ACTION, 'N/A') ACTION /* , ROWS_PROCESSED , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME/1000000) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME/1000000) > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' END ELAPSED_TIME , DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS , SORTS , round(USER_IO_WAIT_TIME/1000000,2) IO_WAIT , round(APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME/1000000,2) APPLICATION_WAIT , round(CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME/1000000,2) CONCURRENCY_WAIT , round(CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME/1000000,2) CLUSTER_WAIT */ , SQL_EXEC_START , case when instr(a.machine, '\') > 0 then substr(a.machine, instr(a.machine, '\')+1) when instr(a.machine, '.') > 0 then substr(a.machine, 1, instr(a.machine, '.')-1) else a.machine end machine , nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,3)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,3)+1)),'N/A') psdomain , nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,5)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,4)+1)),'N/A') process , nvl(substr(a.client_info,1, instr(a.client_info,',',1)-1), 'N/A') emplid , nvl(substr(a.client_info,instr(a.client_info,',',1,1)+1, instr(a.client_info,',',1,2)-(instr(a.client_info,',',1,1)+1)),'N/A') osuser , nvl(substr(client_info,instr(client_info,',',1,2)+1, instr(client_info,',',1,3)-(instr(client_info,',',1,2)+1)),'N/A') Client , case when command = 85 then sql_text else ' ' end sql_text from gv$session a , gv$sql b where a.inst_id = b.inst_id and a.sql_id = b.sql_id and b.sql_id = trim(:SQL_ID) and username is not null and PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY ELAPSED_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT REPLACE(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text FROM gv$sql q WHERE --s.sql_address = q.address AND --s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value AND --s.sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) AND --s.serial# = substr(:SID, instr(:SID, ',')+1) AND --q.inst_id = :INST_ID AND --q.sql_id = :SQL_ID inst_id = :INST_ID and sql_id = :SQL_ID and plan_hash_value = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE and child_number = :SQL_CHILD#

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , SQL_ID --, PLAN_HASH_VALUE , b.executions , CASE WHEN (b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000) is null then ' ' WHEN (b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000) > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((b.ELAPSED_TIME/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' END ELAPSED_TIME , TO_CHAR(round((b.elapsed_time/1000)/nvl(replace(b.executions,0,1),1)),'FM999,999,990') "ELAPSED/EXEC(ms)" , FETCHES , ROWS_PROCESSED , SORTS , DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS , round(CPU_TIME/1000000) CPU_TIME , round(USER_IO_WAIT_TIME/1000000) IOWAIT , round(CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME/1000000) CLUSTER_WAIT , round(CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME/1000000) CONCURRENCY_WAIT , round(APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME/1000000) APPLICATION_WAIT , DIRECT_WRITES , CASE WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES from GV$SQLSTATS b where SQL_ID = :SQL_ID and PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE and INST_ID = :INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT TIMESTAMP , PLAN_HASH_VALUE , LPAD(' ',2*(DEPTH-1)) ||operation ||' ' ||OPTIONS ||' ' ||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = ' --||position || CASE WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' Q' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' T' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' B' WHEN position >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' M' WHEN position >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/1000,2),'FM999990.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(position,'FM999990') || ' ' END ) "EXPLAIN PLAN" , nvl(object_name,' ') object_name , nvl(object_type,' ') object_type , lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' P' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN cardinality >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(cardinality,'FM999000') || ' ' END , 9 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' EB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' EB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_SPACE,'FM999000') || ' ' END TEMP_SPACE , CASE WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(CPU_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS CPU_COST , CASE WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS IO_COST , CASE WHEN TIME is null then ' ' WHEN TIME > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00') ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00') END TIME , PARTITION_ID , PARTITION_START , PARTITION_STOP , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM gv$sql_plan sp , ( SELECT inst_id , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_CHILD_NUMBER = :SQL_CHILD# AND INST_ID = :INST_ID AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_CHILD_NUMBER = :SQL_CHILD# AND INST_ID = :INST_ID AND rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY inst_id , sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE --sp.plan_hash_value = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND --ash.INST_ID = sp.INST_ID AND sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id AND CHILD_NUMBER = :SQL_CHILD# AND sp.inst_id = :INST_ID ORDER BY sp.plan_hash_value , sp.id

select inst_id , sql_id , datatype_string , position , value_string value , last_captured from gv$sql_bind_capture where sql_id = :SQL_ID and inst_id = :INST_ID and CHILD_NUMBER = :SQL_CHILD# order by last_captured , position

select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') ,sql_id ) ) order by day

SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , CASE WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000.00') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE ( o.object_id , o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND sp.OPERATION = 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) --- Update: 2016/08/02 --- Using LISTAGG - anlytical function introduced in database 11gR2 inplace of SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(column_name, ', '),2) for Index column_list ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(dic.column_name, ', ') within group(order by di.owner, di.table_name, di.index_name, dic.column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED from dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented --dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND do.object_type = 'INDEX' AND dic.index_name = di.index_name AND dic.index_name = die.index_name(+) AND dic.COLUMN_POSITION = die.COLUMN_POSITION(+) AND dic.index_owner = do.owner AND dic.index_name = do.object_name AND do.object_name IN ( SELECT o.object_name FROM dba_objects o WHERE ( o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.operation like '%INDEX%' AND sp.object_type IS NOT NULL -- do not delete even if commented. ) ) group by di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , distinct_keys , NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED order by di.table_name , di.index_name

select case when PARTITIONED = 'NO' then 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||','||''''||object_name||''''||',estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size,degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate,cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade,method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' else 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||owner||''''||','||''''||object_name||''''||','||''''||partition_name||''''||',granularity=>'||''''||'AUTO'||''''||',estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size,degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree, no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate,cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade,method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' end "Update Statisticss Statement" from (SELECT o.owner , o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , ts.num_rows , ts.sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED , ts.partition_name FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE ( o.object_id, o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID and PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' )) --where STALE_STATS = 'YES' order by object_name

SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , v.text FROM dba_objects o , dba_views v WHERE ( o.object_id, o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM gv$sql_plan sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND CHILD_NUMBER = :SQL_CHILD# -- AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE ) AND o.owner = v.owner AND o.object_name = v.view_name AND o.object_type = 'VIEW' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

SELECT INST_ID , SID , SERIAL# , SQL_ID , OPNAME , TARGET , SOFAR , TOTALWORK , START_TIME , TRUNC(sl.ELAPSED_SECONDS/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.ELAPSED_SECONDS,60) elapsed , TRUNC(sl.TIME_REMAINING/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.TIME_REMAINING,60) remaining , ROUND(sl.SOFAR/nvl(replace(sl.TOTALWORK,0,1),1)*100, 2) progress_pct FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID AND inst_id = :INST_ID AND sid = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',')-1) AND serial# = substr(:SID, instr(:SID, ',')+1) --time_remaining > 0

select INST_ID --, SID --, SERIAL# --, WAIT_CLASS_ID --, WAIT_CLASS# , WAIT_CLASS --, TOTAL_WAITS , TIME_WAITED --from GV$SESSION_WAIT from GV$SESSION_WAIT_CLASS where INST_ID = :INST_ID and SID = substr(:SID, 1, instr(:SID, ',', 1)-1) and SERIAL# = substr(:SID, instr(:SID, ',', 1)+1)

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(sample_time,'HH24:MI') end_time , event , COUNT(*) sample_count FROM gv$active_session_history WHERE SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND sample_time > sysdate - 30/(24*60) AND event IS NOT NULL GROUP BY (sample_time,'HH24:MI') , event ORDER BY end_time

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI'),'hh24:mi') TIME , o.object_name object_name , COUNT(ash.time_waited) sample_count FROM dba_objects o , gv$active_session_history ash WHERE SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND o.object_id = ash.current_obj# AND ash.sample_time > sysdate - 30/(24*60) AND ash.time_waited IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI') , o.object_name ORDER BY TRUNC(ash.sample_time,'MI') , o.object_name

select 'select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor ('||''''||:SQL_ID||''''||','||:SQL_CHILD#||'));' from dual union select 'select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_awr('||''''||:SQL_ID||''''||'));' from dual
select 'execute DBMS_SHARED_POOL.PURGE ('||''''||ADDRESS||','|| HASH_VALUE||''''||','||''''||'C'||''''||');' "FLUSH SQL" from GV$SQLAREA where SQL_ID = :SQL_ID
select 'alter system kill session '||''''||:SID||''''||';' "Statement" from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2018/11/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT STAT.INSTANCE_NUMBER INST_ID , STAT.SNAP_ID , STAT.SQL_ID , PLAN_HASH_VALUE , (SELECT command_name FROM v$sqlcommand vsc where vsc.command_type = txt.command_type) Command , case when instr(STAT.MODULE,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(STAT.MODULE, 1, instr(STAT.MODULE,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(STAT.MODULE,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(STAT.MODULE, 1, instr(STAT.MODULE,'.',-1,1)-1) else STAT.MODULE end MODULE , nvl(STAT.ACTION, 'N/A') ACTION , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' END TIME , EXECUTIONS_DELTA EXECUTIONS , STAT.SQL_PROFILE , TO_CHAR(SS.END_INTERVAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') END_INTERVAL_TIME FROM DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT STAT , DBA_HIST_SQLTEXT TXT , DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT SS WHERE STAT.SQL_ID = TXT.SQL_ID AND STAT.DBID = TXT.DBID AND SS.DBID = STAT.DBID AND SS.INSTANCE_NUMBER = STAT.INSTANCE_NUMBER AND STAT.SNAP_ID = SS.SNAP_ID AND STAT.SQL_ID = trim(:SQL_ID) AND SS.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME >= trunc(sysdate) - :Days ORDER BY SS.END_INTERVAL_TIME , ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select REPLACE(SQL_TEXT,chr(0)) SQL_TEXT from DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT SS , DBA_HIST_SQLTEXT ST where SS.SQL_ID = ST.SQL_ID AND ST.SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID AND SS.SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID AND SS.PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE

TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' END ELAPSED_TIME , TO_CHAR(round((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000)/nvl(replace(EXECUTIONS_DELTA,0,1),1)),'FM999,999,990') "ELAPSED/EXEC(ms)" , SORTS_DELTA SORTS , FETCHES_DELTA FETCHES , DISK_READS_DELTA DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS_DELTA BUFFER_GETS , CPU_TIME_DELTA CPU_TIME , round(IOWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) IOWAIT , round(CLWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CLUSTER_WAIT , round(CCWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CONCURRENCY_WAIT , round(APWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) APPLICATION_WAIT , DIRECT_WRITES_DELTA DIRECT_WRITES , CASE WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES from DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID AND SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Explain Plan -------- SELECT TIMESTAMP , sp.SQL_ID , PLAN_HASH_VALUE , LPAD(' ',2*(DEPTH-1)) ||operation ||' ' ||OPTIONS ||' ' ||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = ' --||position || CASE WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' Q' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' T' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' B' WHEN position >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' M' WHEN position >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/1000,2),'FM999990.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(position,'FM999990') || ' ' END ) "EXPLAIN PLAN" , nvl(object_type,' ') object_type , nvl(object_name,' ') object_name , nvl(OPTIONS,' ') OPTIONS , lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN cardinality >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(cardinality,'FM999000') || ' ' END , 9 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_SPACE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TEMP_SPACE --, SQL_PROFILE , CASE WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(CPU_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS CPU_COST , CASE WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS IO_COST , CASE WHEN TIME is null then ' ' WHEN TIME > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600/24),'FM999999990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' END TIME , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp , ( SELECT sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id --AND --sp.plan_hash_value = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE ORDER BY PLAN_HASH_VALUE , TIMESTAMP DESC , sp.ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Bind Variables -------- select INSTANCE_NUMBER , snap_id , sql_id , datatype_string , position , value_string value , last_captured from DBA_HIST_SQLBIND where sql_id = :SQL_ID and INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID and snap_id = :SNAP_ID and last_captured is not null order by last_captured , position

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Elapsed Time History -------- select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial --, ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_TOTAL/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value --, ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_TOTAL/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.EXECUTIONS_TOTAL,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Executions' serial --, SUM(sql.executions_delta) value , SUM(sql.EXECUTIONS_TOTAL) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id ) ) order by day

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Table Details -------- SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , CASE WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000.00') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED , case when PARTITIONED ='NO' then 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||o.owner||''''||','||''''||o.object_name||''''||',estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size,degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree,no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate,cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade,method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' else 'execute dbms_stats.gather_table_stats('||''''||o.owner||''''||','||''''||o.object_name||''''||','||''''||partition_name||''''||',granularity=>'||''''||'AUTO'||''''||',estimate_percent=>dbms_stats.auto_sample_size,degree=>dbms_stats.auto_degree,no_invalidate=>dbms_stats.auto_invalidate,cascade=>dbms_stats.auto_cascade,method_opt=>'||''''||'FOR ALL COLUMNS SIZE SKEWONLY'||''''||');' end "Update Statisticss Statement" FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE ( o.object_id , o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND sp.OPERATION = 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) --- Update: 2016/08/02 --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --- Using LISTAGG - ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(dic.column_name, ', ') within group(order by di.owner, di.table_name, di.index_name, dic.column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED from dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented --dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND do.object_type = 'INDEX' AND dic.index_name = di.index_name AND dic.index_name = die.index_name(+) AND dic.COLUMN_POSITION = die.COLUMN_POSITION(+) AND dic.index_owner = do.owner AND dic.index_name = do.object_name AND do.object_name IN ( SELECT o.object_name FROM dba_objects o WHERE ( o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.operation like '%INDEX%' AND sp.object_type IS NOT NULL ) ) group by di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , distinct_keys , NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED order by di.table_name , di.index_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Explain Plan -------- SELECT TIMESTAMP , sp.PLAN_HASH_VALUE , LPAD(' ',2*(DEPTH-1)) ||operation ||' ' ||OPTIONS ||' ' ||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = ' --||position || CASE WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' Q' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' T' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' B' WHEN position >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' M' WHEN position >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/1000,2),'FM999990.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(position,'FM999990') || ' ' END ) "EXPLAIN PLAN" , nvl(object_name,' ') object_name , nvl(object_type,' ') object_type , lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' P' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN cardinality >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(cardinality,'FM999000') || ' ' END , 9 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' EB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' EB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_SPACE,'FM999000') || ' ' END TEMP_SPACE , HS.SQL_PROFILE , CASE WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(CPU_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS CPU_COST , CASE WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS IO_COST , CASE WHEN TIME is null then ' ' WHEN TIME > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600/24),'FM9900') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600*24)/3600),'FM9900')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600),'FM9900') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' END TIME --, NVL(entries,0) AS "Rowsource Time(s)" , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp , ( SELECT sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE ) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash , DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT HS WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id AND sp.sql_id = HS.sql_id AND HS.SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC , sp.id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Bind Variables -------- select INSTANCE_NUMBER , snap_id , sql_id , datatype_string , position , value_string value --, to_char(last_captured,'hh:MI:SS') last_captured , last_captured -- from gv$sql_bind_capture from DBA_HIST_SQLBIND where sql_id = :SQL_ID and INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID and snap_id = :SNAP_ID and last_captured is not null order by last_captured , position

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Elapsed Time History -------- select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') ,sql_id ) ) order by day

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Table Details -------- SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , CASE WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000.00') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/10004,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE ( o.object_id , o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND sp.OPERATION = 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED from dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented --dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND do.object_type = AND do.object_name IN ( SELECT o.object_name FROM dba_objects o WHERE ( o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.operation like '%INDEX%' AND sp.object_type IS NOT NULL ) ) group by di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , distinct_keys , NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED order by di.table_name , di.index_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT DISTINCT p.PRCSINSTANCE , p.OPRID , PRCSTYPE , PRCSNAME /* , to_date(to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') RUNDTTM , to_date(to_char(P.BEGINDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') BEGINDTTM , to_date(to_char(P.ENDDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') ENDDTTM */ , to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'DY YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') RUNDTTM , to_char(P.BEGINDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') BEGINDTTM , to_char(P.ENDDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') ENDDTTM , (P.ENDDTTM-P.BEGINDTTM) RUNTIME --, p.PRCSJOBNAME --, p.MAINJOBNAME , CASE WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 1 THEN 'CANCEL' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 2 THEN 'DELETE' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 3 THEN 'ERROR' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 4 THEN 'HOLD' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 5 THEN 'QUEUED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 6 THEN 'INITIATED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 7 THEN 'PROCESSING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 8 THEN 'CANCELLED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 9 THEN 'SUCCESS' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 10 THEN 'NOT SUCCESSFUL' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 11 THEN 'POSTED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 12 THEN 'UNABLE TO POST' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 13 THEN 'RESEND' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 14 THEN 'POSTING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 15 THEN 'CONTENT GENERATED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 16 THEN 'PENDING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 17 THEN 'SUCCESS WITH WARNING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 18 THEN 'BLOCKED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 19 THEN 'RESTARTING' END RUNSTATUS FROM sysadm.psprcsrqst p WHERE RUNDTTM between trunc(sysdate-:DAYS) and sysdate AND --trunc(sysdate) AND P.RUNSTATUS IN (2, 3, 8, 9) AND (P.PRCSNAME like trim(upper(:PRCSNAME)) or instr(PRCSNAME, trim(upper(:PRCSNAME))) > 0) --P.PRCSNAME = trim(:PRCSNAME) ORDER BY p.PRCSINSTANCE --, to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'DY YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM')

LINK', 113, 'DROP PUBLIC DATABASE LINK', 114, 'GRANT ROLE', 115, 'REVOKE ROLE', 116, 'EXECUTE PROCEDURE', 117, 'USER COMMENT', 118, 'ENABLE TRIGGER', 119, 'DISABLE TRIGGER', 120, 'ENABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 121, 'DISABLE ALL TRIGGERS', 122, 'NETWORK ERROR', 123, 'EXECUTE TYPE', 157, 'CREATE DIRECTORY', 158, 'DROP DIRECTORY', 159, 'CREATE LIBRARY', 160, 'CREATE JAVA', 161, 'ALTER JAVA', 162, SUMMARY', 172, 'ALTER SUMMARY', 173, 'DROP SUMMARY', 174, 'CREATE DIMENSION', 175, 'ALTER DIMENSION', 176, 'DROP DIMENSION', 177, 'CREATE CONTEXT', 178, 'DROP CONTEXT', 179, 'ALTER OUTLINE', 180, 'CREATE OUTLINE', 181, 'DROP OUTLINE', 182, 'UPDATE INDEXES', 183, 'ALTER OPERATOR' ) Command , case when instr(STAT.MODULE,'@',1,1) > 0 then substr(STAT.MODULE, 1, instr(STAT.MODULE,'@',1,1)-1) when instr(STAT.MODULE,'.',-1,1) > 0 then substr(STAT.MODULE, 1, instr(STAT.MODULE,'.',-1,1)-1) else STAT.MODULE end MODULE , nvl(STAT.ACTION, 'N/A') ACTION , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' END TIME , TO_CHAR(SS.END_INTERVAL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') END_INTERVAL_TIME /* , ROWS_PROCESSED_DELTA ROWS_PROCESSED , DISK_READS_DELTA DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS_DELTA BUFFER_GETS , SORTS_DELTA SORTS , IOWAIT_DELTA IOWAIT , APWAIT_DELTA APP_WAIT , CCWAIT_DELTA CONCURRENCY_WAIT , CLWAIT_DELTA CLUSTER_WAIT --, SQL_TEXT */ FROM DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT STAT , DBA_HIST_SQLTEXT TXT , DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT SS WHERE STAT.SQL_ID = TXT.SQL_ID AND STAT.DBID = TXT.DBID AND SS.DBID = STAT.DBID AND SS.INSTANCE_NUMBER = STAT.INSTANCE_NUMBER AND STAT.SNAP_ID = SS.SNAP_ID AND ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000 >= :ELAPSED_TIME AND STAT.EXECUTIONS_DELTA <= 3 AND SS.BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME >= trunc(sysdate)-:Days AND STAT.ACTION not like 'EMSTATSUPD%' AND PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) ORDER BY END_INTERVAL_TIME , ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select SNAP_ID , PLAN_HASH_VALUE , EXECUTIONS_DELTA EXECUTIONS , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000) > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' END ELAPSED_TIME , TO_CHAR(round((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000)/nvl(replace(EXECUTIONS_DELTA,0,1),1)),'FM999,999,990') "ELAPSED/EXEC(ms)" , SORTS_DELTA SORTS , ROWS_PROCESSED_DELTA ROWS_PROCESSED , FETCHES_DELTA FETCHES , DISK_READS_DELTA DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS_DELTA BUFFER_GETS , CPU_TIME_DELTA CPU_TIME , round(IOWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) IOWAIT , round(CLWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CLUSTER_WAIT , round(CCWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CONCURRENCY_WAIT , round(APWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) APPLICATION_WAIT , DIRECT_WRITES_DELTA DIRECT_WRITES , CASE WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES from DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID AND SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Explain Plan -------- SELECT TIMESTAMP , PLAN_HASH_VALUE , LPAD(' ',2*(DEPTH-1)) ||operation ||' ' ||OPTIONS ||' ' ||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = ' --||position || CASE WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' Q' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' T' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' B' WHEN position >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' M' WHEN position >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/1000,2),'FM999990.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(position,'FM999990') || ' ' END ) "EXPLAIN PLAN" , nvl(object_name,' ') object_name , nvl(object_type,' ') object_type , lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000,2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000,2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000,2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN cardinality >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(cardinality,'FM000') || ' ' END , 9 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_SPACE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TEMP_SPACE , CASE WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(CPU_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS CPU_COST , CASE WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS IO_COST , CASE WHEN TIME is null then ' ' WHEN TIME > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' END TIME , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp, ( SELECT sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE --SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE --sp.plan_hash_value = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC , sp.id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Bind Variables -------- select INSTANCE_NUMBER , snap_id , sql_id , datatype_string , position , value_string value , last_captured from DBA_HIST_SQLBIND where sql_id = :SQL_ID and INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID and snap_id = :SNAP_ID and last_captured is not null order by last_captured , position

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Elapsed Time History -------- select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id ) ) order by day

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Table Details -------- SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , CASE WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000.00') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE (o.object_id, o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND sp.OPERATION = 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) --- Update: 2016/08/02 --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --- Using LISTAGG - anlytical function introduced in database 11gR2 inplace of SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(column_name, ', '),2) for Index column_list ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(dic.column_name, ', ') within group(order by di.owner, di.table_name, di.index_name, dic.column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED from dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented --dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND do.object_type = 'INDEX' AND dic.index_name = di.index_name AND dic.index_name = die.index_name(+) AND dic.COLUMN_POSITION = die.COLUMN_POSITION(+) AND dic.index_owner = do.owner AND dic.index_name = do.object_name AND do.object_name IN ( SELECT o.object_name FROM dba_objects o WHERE ( o.object_name) IN ( SELECT sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.operation like '%INDEX%' AND sp.object_type IS NOT NULL ) ) group by di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , distinct_keys , NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED order by di.table_name , di.index_name
select 'WIP' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT DISTINCT p.PRCSINSTANCE , p.OPRID , PRCSTYPE , PRCSNAME /* , to_date(to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') RUNDTTM , to_date(to_char(P.BEGINDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') BEGINDTTM , to_date(to_char(P.ENDDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') ENDDTTM */ , to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') RUNDTTM , to_char(P.BEGINDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') BEGINDTTM , to_char(P.ENDDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') ENDDTTM , (P.ENDDTTM-P.BEGINDTTM) RUNTIME --, p.PRCSJOBNAME --, p.MAINJOBNAME , CASE WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 1 THEN 'CANCEL' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 2 THEN 'DELETE' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 3 THEN 'ERROR' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 4 THEN 'HOLD' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 5 THEN 'QUEUED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 6 THEN 'INITIATED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 7 THEN 'PROCESSING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 8 THEN 'CANCELLED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 9 THEN 'SUCCESS' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 10 THEN 'NOT SUCCESSFUL' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 11 THEN 'POSTED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 12 THEN 'UNABLE TO POST' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 13 THEN 'RESEND' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 14 THEN 'POSTING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 15 THEN 'CONTENT GENERATED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 16 THEN 'PENDING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 17 THEN 'SUCCESS WITH WARNING' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 18 THEN 'BLOCKED' WHEN P.RUNSTATUS = 19 THEN 'RESTARTING' END RUNSTATUS FROM sysadm.psprcsrqst p WHERE --(P.PRCSNAME like trim(upper(:PRCSNAME)) or instr(PRCSNAME, trim(upper(:PRCSNAME))) > 0) --P.PRCSNAME = trim(:PRCSNAME) RUNDTTM between trunc(sysdate-:DAYS) and trunc(sysdate) AND P.RUNSTATUS IN (3, 8, 9) AND p.OPRID = :OPRID ORDER BY to_char(P.RUNDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY')

TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600/24),'FM990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000)/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000),60),'FM00.00')||'s' END ELAPSED_TIME , TO_CHAR(round((ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000)/nvl(replace(EXECUTIONS_DELTA,0,1),1)),'FM999,999,990') "ELAPSED/EXEC(ms)" , SORTS_DELTA SORTS , ROWS_PROCESSED_DELTA ROWS_PROCESSED , FETCHES_DELTA FETCHES , DISK_READS_DELTA DISK_READS , BUFFER_GETS_DELTA BUFFER_GETS , CPU_TIME_DELTA CPU_TIME , round(IOWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) IOWAIT , round(CLWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CLUSTER_WAIT , round(CCWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) CONCURRENCY_WAIT , round(APWAIT_DELTA/1000000,2) APPLICATION_WAIT , DIRECT_WRITES_DELTA DIRECT_WRITES , CASE WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES_DELTA,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END IO_INTERCONNECT_BYTES from DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID AND SQL_ID = :SQL_ID AND SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Explain Plan -------- SELECT TIMESTAMP , sp.PLAN_HASH_VALUE , LPAD(' ',2*(DEPTH-1)) ||operation ||' ' ||OPTIONS ||' ' ||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = ' --||position || CASE WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' Q' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' T' WHEN position >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' B' WHEN position >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/(1000*1000),2),'FM999990.00') || ' M' WHEN position >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(position/1000,2),'FM999990.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(position,'FM999990') || ' ' END ) "EXPLAIN PLAN" , nvl(object_name,' ') object_name , nvl(object_type,' ') object_type , lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN cardinality >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN cardinality >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(cardinality/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(cardinality,'FM999000') || ' ' END , 9 , ' ' ) AS "ROWS" , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM999000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/1024,2),'FM999000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , CASE WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TEMP_SPACE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_SPACE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_SPACE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TEMP_SPACE , HS.SQL_PROFILE , CASE WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN CPU_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CPU_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(CPU_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS CPU_COST , CASE WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' Q' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' T' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' B' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' M' WHEN IO_COST >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(IO_COST/1000,2),'FM999000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(IO_COST,'FM999000.00') || ' ' END AS IO_COST , CASE WHEN TIME is null then ' ' WHEN TIME > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600/24),'FM999999990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TIME/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(TIME,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(TIME,60),'FM00')||'s' END TIME , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp , ( SELECT sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value , COUNT(*) entries FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND ( sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE) IN ( SELECT sql_exec_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE FROM DBA_HIST_ACTIVE_SESS_HISTORY WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID and SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND rownum = 1 ) GROUP BY sql_id , sql_exec_id , sql_plan_line_id , sql_plan_hash_value ) ash , DBA_HIST_SQLSTAT HS WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+) = sp.id AND sp.sql_id = HS.SQL_ID AND HS.SNAP_ID = :SNAP_ID ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC , sp.id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Bind Variables -------- select INSTANCE_NUMBER , snap_id , sql_id , datatype_string , position , value_string value , last_captured from DBA_HIST_SQLBIND where sql_id = :SQL_ID and INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID and snap_id = :SNAP_ID and last_captured is not null order by last_captured , position

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Elapsed Time History -------- select day , serial , value from ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Elapsed time(s)' serial , ROUND(AVG((SQL.ELAPSED_TIME_DELTA/1000000/nvl(replace(sql.executions_delta,0,1),1) )),2) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id union all ( select to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') day , 'Executions' serial , SUM(sql.executions_delta) value from dba_hist_sqlstat sql , dba_hist_snapshot s where s.snap_id = sql.snap_id AND SQL.sql_id = :SQL_ID GROUP BY to_char(s.begin_interval_time,'mm/dd') , sql_id ) ) order by day

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) -------- Table Details -------- SELECT o.object_name , o.object_type , o.status , o.CREATED , o.LAST_DDL_TIME , ts.last_analyzed , CASE WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.num_rows >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.num_rows >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.num_rows/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.num_rows,'FM000.00') || ' ' END num_rows , CASE WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN ts.sample_size >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN ts.sample_size >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(ts.sample_size/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(ts.sample_size,'FM000.00') || ' ' END sample_size , ts.STATTYPE_LOCKED , ts.STALE_STATS , t.DEGREE , t.INSTANCES , t.PARTITIONED FROM dba_objects o , dba_tab_statistics ts , dba_tables t WHERE ( o.object_id , o.object_name ) IN ( SELECT sp.OBJECT# , sp.object_name FROM DBA_HIST_SQL_PLAN sp WHERE sql_id = :SQL_ID AND PLAN_HASH_VALUE = :PLAN_HASH_VALUE AND sp.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND sp.OPERATION = 'TABLE ACCESS' ) AND o.owner = ts.owner AND o.owner = t.owner AND o.object_name = ts.table_name AND ts.table_name = t.table_name AND o.object_type = 'TABLE' AND o.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by o.object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/26 (of last update/validation) --- Update: 2016/08/02 --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --- Using LISTAGG - anlytical function introduced in database 11gR2 inplace of SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(column_name, ', '),2) for Index column_list ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select di.owner , di.table_name , di.index_name , di.status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(dic.column_name, ', ') within group(order by di.owner, di.table_name, di.index_name, dic.column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN
